name: AUTOMOTIVETALK
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: At FIGS Engineering, we want our customers to have a voice. We created this skill to interact with our customers questions on automotive related items, weekly news. We take customer requests via our facebook and instagram pages and answer several questions a week.
